name: Foliage
desc: Small plants that, while they are not enough to obstruct movement, can provide some meager defense.
destroy: If _Destroyed_ by Fire Damage, this space becomes _Blazing_.

name: Ice Panel
desc: A thin sheet of ice, easy to break through.
destroy: Inflict _Frost_ 1 on a creature of your choice adjacent to the _Obstacle_. If _Destroyed_ by a _Collision_, the Colliding creature is always the Target.

name: Water Veil
desc: A suspended veil of water that provides considerable defense against assault.
special: Any creature that enters this _Obstacle's_ space or ends their _Turn_ in it gains _Soaked_ 1. Creatures always have _Resistance_ 1 to _Fire_ _Attacks_ that pass through this _Obstacle_.
destroy:
* If _Destroyed_ by a _Draw_ effect, nothing occurs.
* If _Destroyed_ by _Fire_/_Lighting_ Damage this space becomes _Veiled_.
* If the space this _Obstacle_ is in becomes _Frozen_ or _Destroyed_ by _Cold_ Damage, replace it with an _Ice Panel_.
* If _Destroyed_ by any other means, the space becomes _Wet_.

name: Planted Shield
desc: A shield planted firmly in the ground to provide cover.
special: Hardness is the same as the original shield. If it takes Damage equal to half of its Hardness or greater the Obstacle is removed and the shield is placed undamaged in the space. If a creature is in this obstacle's space they may use their own _Reactions_ and _Negate_ if the shield is Attacked as if they were being attacked.
interact: You must be in the same space as the shield to use this _Interact_. Choose 3 sides of the current space. You are _Covered_ against any Attack that passes through one of these spaces while the _Obstacle_ is here. This ends when you move out of this space or _Attack_.
destroy: The original shield is placed _Sundered_ in this space.

name: Earth Block
desc: A small earthen protrusion, sufficient to provide cover but easy to climb.
forced_movement: [_Earth_] _Forced Movement_ may move this _Obstacle, but reduces the value by 1. _Forced Movement_ used in this way may not be used to _Destroy_ the _Obstacle_.
destroy: Make this space _Veiled_ and _Rough_. Inflict  _Dazed_ 1, _Push_ 1, 4 Crush Damage [_Avoidable_] on a creature of your choice adjacent to the _Obstacle_.

name: Ice Wall
desc: A solid wall of ice that can provide a suitable defense.
destroy: Inflict _Frost_ 1 on a creature of your choice adjacent to the _Obstacle_. If _Destroyed_ by a _Collision_, the Colliding creature is always the Target.

name: Earth Pillar
desc: A pillar of stone that can survive nearly all hardships.
forced_movement: [_Earth_] _Forced Movement_ may move this _Obstacle, but reduces the value by 3. _Forced Movement_ used in this way may not be used to _Destroy_ the _Obstacle_.
destroy:
Choose one:
* Create a _Line_ 2 _Hazard_ on the opposite side of this Obstacle. At the end of the _Round_, remove this Obstacle and inflict _Dazed_ 1, _Prone_ [2 _Stamina_] on all creatures in the _Hazard_ spaces, then make those spaces _Rough_. Any creature in the Obstacle's space when it is removed immediately _Falls_.
* As above, but pay 2 _Momentum_ to resolve the effect immediately.

name: Ice Pillar
desc: A pillar of ice that is sturdier than most.
destroy:
Choose one:
* Create a _Line_ 2 _Hazard_ on the opposite side of this Obstacle. At the end of the _Round_, remove this Obstacle and inflict _Frost_ 1, _Prone_ [1 _Stamina_] on all creatures in the _Hazard_ spaces, then make those _Freezing Fog_ until the end of the next _Phase_. Any creature in the Obstacle's space when it is removed immediately _Falls_.
* As above, but pay 2 _Momentum_ to resolve the effect immediately.

name: Boulder
desc: A hard, solid chunk of stone that is well-suited for ramming into targets.
forced_movement: _Forced Movement_ may move this _Obstacle, but reduces the value by 3, or 1 if it is [_Earth_]. This _Forced Movement_ is always _Forceful_. If the _Forced Movement_ is already _Forceful_, deal +1 Damage. If the _Boulder_ moved to a lower _Elevation_, deal +1 Damage.
destroy: Make this space _Veiled_ and _Rough_. Inflict  _Dazed_ 1, _Push_ 1, 2 Crush Damage [_Avoidable_] on a creature of your choice adjacent to the _Obstacle_.

name: Earth Spire
desc: A sharp, pointed stone ready to pierce an unfortunate soul.
forced_movement: [_Earth_] _Forced Movement_ may move this _Obstacle, but reduces the value by 2. _Forced Movement_ used in this way may not be used to _Destroy_ the _Obstacle_. A space of _Forced Movement_ may be used to rotate this _Obstacle_.
destroy: Place a _Large Improvised_ Weapon in this space. It is made of Stone and has the _Fragile_ and _Opportune_ keywords.
special: When this _Obstacle_ is created, choose one face. If a creature _Collides_ with this _Obstacle_ on that face, deal Stab Damage and inflict _Bleed_ equal to the _Vulnerable_ inflicted. Treat this space as _Jagged_ for larger creatures that can occupy it.
